Title: Provides for emergency appropriation for the period April 1, 2025 through April 9, 2025
Summary: Provides for emergency appropriation through April 9, 2025 for the support of government.
ActClause: AN ACT making appropriations for the support of government; to amend chapter 113 of the laws of 2025 making appropriations for the support of government, in relation thereto; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
